Specific to General Followup.text: Complete an 8-week course of high-dose Pantoprazole.
Specific to General Followup.explanation: The EHR specifies 'high dose PPI (started 40mg pantoprazole PO twice daily...for upper GI bleed likely from gastritis.' The summary should have specified 40mg twice daily as the dosage rather than 'high dose Pantoprazole,' as this provides a clear understanding of the necessary recovery timeline.
